Class Field

java.lang.Object
  Field

public class Field
extends java.lang.Object

Represent a rectangular grid of field positions. Each position is able to store a single animal.

Version:
2006.03.30
Author:
David J. Barnes and Michael Kolling

          Represent a field of the given dimensions.
